name: The Misadventures of Butter Boy
description:
Controls:

W,  A, S, D

This game was created over the span of 3 hours 30 minutes by a group of three. The interactability,  Animation controller, and player controller were made by Josh Church. The  art in the main levels and the sprite sheet for Butter Boy were made by Jack Kinzig. The art for the cutscenes and story were made by Tucker Vanderwielen.
